title: How is the battery life on the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: I read this from some websites (http://appleinsiders.com). According to Tom's Guide, new testing shows that the iPhone 12 lasts 10 hours and 23 minutes under 4G usage, but only 8 hours and 25 minutes with 5G. Similarly, the iPhone 12 Pro tested using solely 4G managed 11 hours and 24 minutes, but with 5G was 9 hours and 6 minutes. This is bad. Even at 4G, the 12 lasted only 10.5 hrs and pro lasted only 11.5 hrs? I can’t imagine what the Mini will be at… Forget 5G… Why can’t apple just stick a larger battery inside?????

Apple don't leak the battery specification of its iphone 12 series but in my opinion iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 pro battery life is better as compared to last iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 pro because this year iPhone 12 series models comes with more efficient A14 bionic processor.
